about_the_game:
Droid Death VR is a Multiplayer Shooter in Virtual Reality set in a sci fi universe where maps are designed around specific planets to have fun shooting your friends and other players.

Demo Release

Features

Basics

Quick match making
Shooter combat
VR
Steam friends Join option
Power ups

Game match types

4v4 Team Deathmatch
Dunk the ball match
Battle royal match

Weapon Types

Pistol
Blaster
Wave Blaster
Rifle
Shotgun
Sniper
Grenade launcher
Rocket launcher
Gatling Blaster

name: Droid Death VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8500 @ 3.00GHz Coffee Lake 14nm Technology
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER (NVIDIA)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8500 @ 3.00GHz Coffee Lake 14nm Technology
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER (NVIDIA)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Droid Death VR is a Multiplayer Shooter in Virtual Reality set in a sci fi universe where maps are designed around specific planets to have fun shooting your friends and other players.
